Day 1 - Sunday 7th July.title: Land at IBZ and collect rental cars
Day 1 - Sunday 7th July.description: After baggage claim Slands and Josh pick cars up from ClickRent. Rest of gang better off waiting at the airport as the mini-bus is small and the airport is air-conditioned. We'll swing back and collect you at a pre-arranged point once we've got it. Do not forget to pre-arrange a point (again). Half an hour for passport control and bags, maybe an hour for rental collection. Should be on the road by 11am.

Day 1 - Sunday 7th July.title: Villa keys & hunter-gathering
Day 1 - Sunday 7th July.description: Check in is at 4pm, ideally we ask and they let us check in at midday. Find our way to the villa, put our shit down, take a bit of a break, arrange some kind of supermarket trip and a trip for party supplies. Worst case we do all the other stuff first, then check in at 4pm.
